statements: SELECT * FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';

SELECT AVG(value) FROM TimeSeriesData;

SELECT MIN(value) FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE category = 'A';
SELECT timestamp, AVG(value) FROM TimeSeriesData GROUP BY timestamp;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM TimeSeriesData;
SELECT * FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE value > 100;
SELECT timestamp, SUM(value) FROM TimeSeriesData GROUP BY timestamp;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) FROM TimeSeriesData GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE category IN ('A', 'B');
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT category, MAX(value) FROM TimeSeriesData GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE category = 'B' AND value < 50;
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_value FROM TimeSeriesData;
SELECT category, MAX(value), MIN(value) FROM TimeSeriesData GROUP BY category;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT category) FROM TimeSeriesData;
SELECT category, SUM(value) FROM TimeSeriesData GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT AVG(value) FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE category = 'A';
SELECT MAX(value) FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE category = 'B';
SELECT SUM(value) FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE category = 'C';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE category = 'D';
SELECT * FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31 23:59:59' AND category = 'A';
SELECT category, COUNT(*) FROM TimeSeriesData GROUP BY category;
SELECT timestamp, value FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM TimeSeriesData;
SELECT timestamp, SUM(value) AS total_value FROM TimeSeriesData GROUP BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE category LIKE '%A%';
SELECT MIN(value) FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT AVG(value) AS avg_value, category FROM TimeSeriesData GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE timestamp IN ('2022-01-01', '2022-01-02', '2022-01-03');
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT category) FROM TimeSeriesData;
SELECT timestamp, value FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE category = 'B' ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT category, AVG(value) FROM TimeSeriesData GROUP BY category HAVING AVG(value) > 50;
SELECT category, MAX(value) FROM TimeSeriesData GROUP BY category HAVING MAX(value) < 100;
SELECT * FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE value > 50;
SELECT * FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE category = 'C' LIMIT 10;

SELECT MIN(value) FROM patterns_and_trends;
SELECT pattern_name, category FROM patterns_metadata WHERE metadata_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patterns_and_trends;
SELECT id, timestamp, value FROM patterns_and_trends WHERE value > 50;
SELECT pattern_name, category FROM patterns_metadata WHERE pattern_name LIKE '%pattern%';
SELECT id, timestamp FROM patterns_and_trends ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, COUNT(*) FROM patterns_metadata GROUP BY pattern_name;
SELECT id, MAX(value) FROM patterns_and_trends GROUP BY id;
SELECT pattern_name, category FROM patterns_metadata WHERE category = 'trend';
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM patterns_metadata;
SELECT id, AVG(value) FROM patterns_and_trends GROUP BY id;
SELECT pattern_name, category FROM patterns_metadata WHERE metadata_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM patterns_and_trends WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT pattern_name, category FROM patterns_metadata WHERE category = 'trends'
SELECT id, timestamp, value FROM patterns_and_trends WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT AVG(value) as avg_value FROM patterns_and_trends GROUP BY timestamp
SELECT pattern_name, COUNT(pattern_name) as occurrences FROM patterns_metadata GROUP BY pattern_name HAVING COUNT(pattern_name) > 1
SELECT p.id, pm.pattern_name FROM patterns_and_trends p INNER JOIN patterns_metadata pm ON p.id = pm.metadata_id
SELECT MAX(value) as max_value FROM patterns_and_trends
SELECT pattern_name, SUM(value) as total_value FROM patterns_metadata pm INNER JOIN patterns_and_trends pt ON pm.metadata_id = pt.id GROUP BY pm.pattern_name
SELECT * FROM patterns_and_trends pt LEFT JOIN patterns_metadata pm ON pt.id = pm.metadata_id
SELECT pattern_name, COUNT(id) as total_patterns FROM patterns_metadata pm INNER JOIN patterns_and_trends pt ON pm.metadata_id = pt.id GROUP BY pm.pattern_name ORDER BY total_patterns DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM patterns_data;
SELECT pattern_name, trend_type FROM patterns_data;
SELECT * FROM patterns_mapping;
SELECT pattern_id, trend_id FROM patterns_mapping;
SELECT * FROM trends_data;
SELECT trend_name, trend_value FROM trends_data;
SELECT * FROM patterns_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patterns_data WHERE pattern_name = 'example_pattern';
SELECT * FROM patterns_mapping WHERE pattern_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patterns_mapping WHERE trend_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM trends_data WHERE trend_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM trends_data WHERE trend_name = 'example_trend';

SELECT patterns_data.id, patterns_data.pattern_name, trends_data.trend_name FROM patterns_data INNER JOIN patterns_mapping ON patterns_data.id = patterns_mapping.pattern_id INNER JOIN trends_data ON patterns_mapping.trend_id = trends_data.trend_id;

SELECT patterns_data.id, patterns_data.pattern_name, trends_data.trend_name FROM patterns_data LEFT JOIN patterns_mapping ON patterns_data.id = patterns_mapping.pattern_id LEFT JOIN trends_data ON patterns_mapping.trend_id = trends_data.trend_id;

SELECT patterns_data.id, patterns_data.pattern_name, trends_data.trend_name FROM patterns_data RIGHT JOIN patterns_mapping ON patterns_data.id = patterns_mapping.pattern_id RIGHT JOIN trends_data ON patterns_mapping.trend_id = trends_data.trend_id;

SELECT patterns_data.id, patterns_data.pattern_name, trends_data.trend_name FROM patterns_data INNER JOIN patterns_mapping ON patterns_data.id = patterns_mapping.pattern_id INNER JOIN trends_data ON patterns_mapping.trend_id = trends_data.trend_id WHERE patterns_data.timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';

SELECT patterns_data.id, patterns_data.pattern_name, trends_data.trend_name FROM patterns_data INNER JOIN patterns_mapping ON patterns_data.id = patterns_mapping.pattern_id INNER JOIN trends_data ON patterns_mapping.trend_id = trends_data.trend_id WHERE trends_data.trend_value > 100;

SELECT patterns_data.id, patterns_data.pattern_name, trends_data.trend_name FROM patterns_data INNER JOIN patterns_mapping ON patterns_data.id = patterns_mapping.pattern_id INNER JOIN trends_data ON patterns_mapping.trend_id = trends_data.trend_id WHERE trends_data.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM patterns_data WHERE pattern_name = 'ABC'
SELECT pattern_name, trend_type FROM patterns_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT patterns_data.id, patterns_data.pattern_name, trends_data.trend_name FROM patterns_data JOIN trends_data ON patterns_data.id = trends_data.trend_id
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patterns_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT patterns_data.pattern_name, trends_data.trend_value FROM patterns_data LEFT JOIN trends_data ON patterns_data.id = trends_data.trend_id WHERE trends_data.trend_value > 50
SELECT DISTINCT pattern_name FROM patterns_data
SELECT AVG(trend_value) AS avg_trend_value FROM trends_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-06-01'
SELECT pattern_name, COUNT(*) AS trend_count FROM patterns_data JOIN patterns_mapping ON patterns_data.id = patterns_mapping.pattern_id GROUP BY pattern_name
SELECT pattern_name, MAX(trend_value) AS max_trend_value FROM patterns_data JOIN trends_data ON patterns_data.id = trends_data.trend_id GROUP BY pattern_name
SELECT * FROM patterns_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT pattern_name, SUM(trend_value) AS total_trend_value FROM patterns_data JOIN trends_data ON patterns_data.id = trends_data.trend_id GROUP BY pattern_name
SELECT DISTINCT pattern_name FROM patterns_data WHERE pattern_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT pattern_name, AVG(trend_value) AS avg_trend_value FROM patterns_data JOIN trends_data ON patterns_data.id = trends_data.trend_id GROUP BY pattern_name HAVING avg_trend_value > 50
SELECT pattern_name, MIN(trend_value) AS min_trend_value FROM patterns_data JOIN trends_data ON patterns_data.id = trends_data.trend_id GROUP BY pattern_name
SELECT trend_name, AVG(trend_value) AS avg_trend_value FROM trends_data GROUP BY trend_name HAVING avg_trend_value < 30
SELECT patterns_data.id, patterns_data.pattern_name, trends_data.trend_name FROM patterns_data LEFT JOIN trends_data ON patterns_data.id = trends_data.trend_id
SELECT pattern_name FROM patterns_data UNION SELECT trend_name FROM trends_data
SELECT pattern_name, trend_value FROM patterns_data INNER JOIN trends_data ON patterns_data.id = trends_data.trend_id WHERE trend_name = 'XYZ'
SELECT pattern_name, MAX(trend_value) AS max_trend_value FROM patterns_data JOIN trends_data ON patterns_data.id = trends_data.trend_id GROUP BY pattern_name HAVING max_trend_value > 100

SELECT pattern_name, trend_value FROM patterns_data INNER JOIN trends_data ON patterns_data.id = trends_data.trend_id WHERE patterns_data.id IN (SELECT pattern_id FROM patterns_mapping WHERE trend_id = 1)

SELECT pattern_name, description, created_at FROM patterns WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patterns FROM patterns;
SELECT * FROM time_series_data WHERE value BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM patterns p JOIN trends t ON p.id = t.id;
SELECT query_text AS query, execution_time AS time FROM queries WHERE executed_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT DISTINCT trend_name FROM trends;
SELECT pattern_name, AVG(trend_value) AS avg_value FROM patterns JOIN trends ON patterns.id = trends.id GROUP BY pattern_name;
SELECT * FROM patterns WHERE description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_queries FROM queries;
SELECT trend_name, MAX(trend_value) AS max_value FROM trends GROUP BY trend_name;
SELECT pattern_name, trend_name, trend_value FROM patterns JOIN trends ON patterns.id = trends.id;
SELECT timestamp, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM time_series_data GROUP BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM patterns p LEFT JOIN trends t ON p.id = t.id;
SELECT SUM(value) AS total_value FROM time_series_data;
SELECT pattern_name, trend_name, t.trend_value FROM patterns p JOIN (SELECT * FROM trends WHERE trend_value > 50) t ON p.id = t.id;

SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends WHERE id = 1;

SELECT query_name, query_description FROM queries WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM results;
SELECT result_name, result_description FROM results WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patterns WHERE pattern_name LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM trends WHERE trend_name LIKE '%number%';
SELECT * FROM time_series_data WHERE value > 100;
SELECT * FROM queries WHERE query_name = 'example_query';
SELECT * FROM results WHERE result_name = 'example_result';
SELECT pattern_name, trend_name, value FROM patterns INNER JOIN trends ON patterns.id = trends.id INNER JOIN time_series_data ON patterns.id = time_series_data.id;
SELECT query_name,  trend_name, result_name FROM queries INNER JOIN trends ON queries.id = trends.id INNER JOIN results ON queries.id = results.id;
SELECT pattern_name, trend_name, value FROM patterns LEFT JOIN trends ON patterns.id = trends.id LEFT JOIN time_series_data ON patterns.id = time_series_data.id;
SELECT query_name, trend_name, result_name FROM queries LEFT JOIN trends ON queries.id = trends.id LEFT JOIN results ON queries.id = results.id;

SELECT pattern_name AS 'Pattern Name', trend_name AS 'Trend Name', value AS 'Value' FROM patterns INNER JOIN trends ON patterns.id = trends.id INNER JOIN time_series_data ON patterns.id = time_series_data.id;
SELECT * FROM patterns;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM patterns WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, pattern_name FROM patterns WHERE pattern_description IS NOT NULL;

SELECT trend_name FROM trends WHERE id > 5;

SELECT id, value FROM time_series_data WHERE value > 100;
SELECT * FROM queries;
SELECT query_name FROM queries WHERE query_description LIKE '%analysis%';
SELECT * FROM results WHERE id = 10;
SELECT result_name FROM results WHERE id < 5;
SELECT patterns.pattern_name, results.result_name FROM patterns INNER JOIN results ON patterns.id = results.id;
SELECT trends.trend_name, time_series_data.value FROM trends LEFT JOIN time_series_data ON trends.id = time_series_data.id;
SELECT * FROM patterns WHERE pattern_name LIKE 'A%' OR pattern_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM patterns WHERE LENGTH(pattern_description) > 50;
SELECT pattern_name, trend_name, result_name FROM patterns INNER JOIN trends ON patterns.id = trends.id INNER JOIN results ON trends.id = results.id;
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value, MIN(value) AS min_value FROM time_series_data;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patterns FROM patterns;
SELECT DISTINCT pattern_name FROM patterns;
SELECT AVG(value) AS avg_value, SUM(value) AS sum_value FROM time_series_data;
SELECT pattern_name, result_name FROM patterns CROSS JOIN results ORDER BY pattern_name ASC, result_name DESC;
